statements: SELECT * FROM communication_records ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sender, receiver, communication_date FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice'
SELECT content FROM communication_records WHERE receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY communication_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date >= '2022-01-01' AND communication_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT record_id, sender, receiver FROM communication_records ORDER BY record_id
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice' AND receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender, receiver, communication_date FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM communication_records WHERE receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT content FROM communication_records WHERE communication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(content)) AS average_content_length FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, message FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE receiver = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM ManipulationOpportunities WHERE method = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT target, identified_by FROM ManipulationOpportunities WHERE identified_by = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE sender='Alice';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM CommunicationRecords ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM CommunicationRecords GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT DISTINCT sender FROM CommunicationRecords WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT target, method FROM ManipulationOpportunities WHERE identified_by='Admin' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT receiver_id, message FROM communication_records WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT record_id, message, sender_id, receiver_id FROM communication_records WHERE record_id = 3;
SELECT engineer_name FROM social_engineers WHERE engineer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM manipulation_opportunities WHERE engineer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message, sender_id FROM communication_records WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY sender_id ASC;

SELECT communication_records.record_id, communication_records.sender_id, social_engineers.engineer_name FROM communication_records JOIN social_engineers ON communication_records.sender_id = social_engineers.engineer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM communication_records;

SELECT communication_records.record_id, manipulation_opportunities.opportunity_description FROM communication_records LEFT JOIN manipulation_opportunities ON communication_records.record_id = manipulation_opportunities.record_id ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_records;
SELECT sender, receiver, timestamp FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT message FROM communication_records WHERE receiver = 'Bob' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM manipulation_attempts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT attacker, target, tactic FROM manipulation_attempts WHERE tactic LIKE '%phishing%' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM communication_records WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT sender, receiver, COUNT(*) FROM communication_records GROUP BY sender, receiver;
SELECT * FROM manipulation_attempts WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_report FROM analysis_results WHERE manipulation_attempt_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_reports WHERE severity > 3 AND status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords;
SELECT sender_id, sender_name, sender_phone FROM SenderInformation;
SELECT receiver_name, receiver_email FROM ReceiverInformation WHERE receiver_id = 1;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM CommunicationRecords ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_location FROM Attackers WHERE attack_method = 'Phishing';
SELECT * FROM CommunicationRecords ORDER BY communication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_name, sender_email, receiver_name, receiver_email FROM SenderInformation LEFT JOIN ReceiverInformation ON SenderInformation.sender_id = ReceiverInformation.receiver_id;

SELECT sender_name AS Sender, receiver_name AS Receiver, manipulation_type AS Manipulation_Type FROM SenderInformation INNER JOIN CommunicationRecords ON SenderInformation.sender_id = CommunicationRecords.sender_id INNER JOIN ManipulationOpportunities ON CommunicationRecords.communication_id = ManipulationOpportunities.communication_id;
SELECT attacker_name, attacker_location, attack_method FROM Attackers WHERE attack_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT sender_name, sender_email, receiver_name, receiver_email, manipulation_type, manipulation_description FROM SenderInformation INNER JOIN CommunicationRecords ON SenderInformation.sender_id = CommunicationRecords.sender_id INNER JOIN ManipulationOpportunities ON CommunicationRecords.communication_id = ManipulationOpportunities.communication_id ORDER BY manipulation_date DESC;
